message_1: Let there be a set A = {1, 2, 3} and a set B = {2, 3, 4}. Write down the cartesian product of set A and set B, A x B.
message_2:
The Cartesian product of set A and set B, denoted as A x B, is the set of all ordered pairs (a, b) where a is in A and b is in B.

A x B = {(1, 2), (1, 3), (1, 4), (2, 2), (2, 3), (2, 4), (3, 2), (3, 3), (3, 4)}
